dt-option.name: stateRestore.create
dt-option.summary: Enable/Disable the creation of new states

type.description: True if creation is to be enabled, false if not.

dt-option.default: The default value for the `-init stateRestore.create` option is `true` meaning that as standard creation of new states will be enabled.
dt-option.description:
This option allows for the creation of states to be enabled or disabled.
As default the value is true, meaning that states can be created. If this option is set to false, then creation will be disabled.
Take a look at [this example]([../extensions/StateRestore/examples/initialisation/noCreation.html) to see this in action.
